alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 1:19PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bonneville County through 200 PM MDT... At 118 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over northwestern Palisades Reservoir, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palisades Reservoir, Irwin, and Alpine Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Palisades Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Strong winds will create rough chop. Lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
